new-account-email:
A new IEG review account has been created for you.

Your login info is:

username: $1
password: $2

You may login at: $3

You may change your password at: $4

Sincerely,
Individual Engagement Grants committee
credits-page-license: The Wikimedia IEG review software is open source and available under the GNU General Public License 3.0.
credits-page-scholarships: The application is based on code developed for the Wikimania Scholarships application.
credits-page-logo: The glasses logo is by Wikimedia Commons user Heatherawalls and used under the Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal Public Domain Dedication license.
privacy-page: All personal information will be held strictly confidential by the members of the Individual Engagement Grants committee and the Wikimedia Foundation, in accordance to the Wikimedia Foundation privacy policy.
error-message: An unexpected error has occurred and we are working to fix the problem. Please try again in a moment.
404-message: The page you requested cannot be found. Please check the link/URL and try again.
csrf-message: The request that was submitted was missing the request forgery protection token. Please return to the form, reload the page and try again.
proposals-add-error: Your submission has errors.  Please correct the following errors and submit the form again.
